title: ‘Kantara: Chapter 1’ BO collection day 21 - Rishab Shetty-starrer crosses Rs 550 cr mark
description: Rishab Shetty's 'Kantara: Chapter 1' is a box office sensation, crossing ₹550 crore in India three weeks post-release. Its strong performance through Diwali, with significant earnings daily, highlights its pan-India appeal beyond Karnataka. The film's universal themes resonate widely, impacting its OTT release date, which is now uncertain due to continued theatrical success.

'Not even Magnus Carlsen': How Norway Chess did what Freestyle couldn't - exclusive
description: In a twist that’s shaken up the global chess scene, Norway Chess has pulled off what even Magnus Carlsen’s Freestyle tour couldn’t, convincing FIDE to approve a brand-new World Championship title. The “Total Chess World Championship” marks a stunning power play that could redefine how elite chess is played and governed.

title: Big changes in IT Rules soon? Centre mulls tweaks - AI, deepfakes in focus
description: India's IT ministry is proposing new rules to combat AI-generated deepfakes and synthetic content. Social media giants with over 50 lakh users must identify and label artificial content, ensuring users can distinguish it from reality. These measures aim to boost accountability and user awareness amidst growing concerns over AI misuse.

Seeking refuge from bursting fireworks, the canine commuter wandered through compartments in search of calm, winning over every commuter along the way. Watch the touching moment that’s reminding everyone what compassion looks like this Diwali.

PCB chairman Mohsin Naqvi insists on personally handing the trophy to India in Dubai on November 10, following India's refusal to accept it from him after their win. This stems from tensions between the Indian team and the ACC president.

Yogi Adityanath defends Halal ban; says ended Eid milan tradition at CM house
description: Uttar Pradesh CM Yogi Adityanath defended the state's ban on Halal-certified products, alleging funds were misused for terrorism, 'love jihad,' and conversions. He stated these certifications operate as an unregulated system, earning significant amounts without official recognition. Adityanath also discussed the secularization of official events, emphasizing inclusivity beyond religious celebrations.

ChatGPT gets browser: Google loses $150B; Chrome monopoly threat
description: OpenAI's new AI browser, ChatGPT Atlas, has shaken the tech world.  The launch caused a massive $150 billion drop in Alphabet's market value.  CEO Sam Altman called it a rare chance to redefine web browsing.  Atlas integrates ChatGPT directly, allowing AI to perform tasks.  This poses a significant challenge to Google's search advertising revenue.  Investors are watching closely as Google also integrates AI into its Chrome browser.  The competition for browser dominance is heating up.

title: Delhi had a blast: In Karol Bagh, it was a scream! Stations exceeded standard decibel levels
description: Delhi's Diwali festivities ringing in this year brought an unexpected surge of noise, with several monitoring stations recording decibel levels well beyond what is legally acceptable. Even with a green cracker initiative and allotted hours for bursting, the decibel meter was pushed to its limits, particularly from 9 pm until 11 pm, spilling over into the night across many regions.

title: H-1B fears cool, companies hiring from US campuses to gain
Delhi air pollution: At peak hours, data goes blank at many stations
description: Air quality monitoring stations in Delhi experienced significant data gaps during peak pollution hours, with several stations going offline when PM2.5 and PM10 levels neared 1,000 µg/m³. Experts allege this skews 24-hour averages and hinders understanding of pollution's impact. Authorities, however, deny any missing data.

title: Clearing the air: Delhi's AQI 2000+ or under 400? Why apps show different figures
description: Delhi residents were confused by vastly different pollution readings on Tuesday. While India's CPCB showed AQI below 400, international apps like IQAir reported over 2,000. Experts explain these discrepancies stem from different calculation methods and data sources, though both indicate dangerously poor air quality post-Diwali.

title: Daniel Naroditsky net worth 2025: Chess grandmaster’s income, death & legacy
description: Chess world mourns Daniel Naroditsky, a beloved American grandmaster and online teacher. Naroditsky, known for his clear lessons, died at 29. His estimated net worth in 2025 was one million dollars. He inspired countless players globally through YouTube, Twitch, and coaching. His passing leaves a void in the chess community, remembered for making the game accessible and enjoyable for all.
